title: Two Possibilities
itunes:title: Two Possibilities
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
In space, no one can hear you cry. The silence. The cold. The isolation. How much could you take?

***

Credited to user EmpyRealInvective. Check out his Amazon page HERE

 

***

Narrated by Heather Thomas and Cynthia Reinhardt

***
